attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to urge gordon brown to step down as leader of this country.
He has done nothing but satisfy his own agender and greed. He has almost single handedly crippled the economic infastructure of great britain to instill his 'new world order'.
He needs to step down and walk away as public support for his 'friends' is at an unbelievable low.Never has one man been so unpopular. Gordon Brown must go

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
